name: Full English Breakfast Simulator
description:
You're hungry. Why else would you visit your local caf? You could just have beans on toast, or maybe eggs and bacon, or how about a nice cup of tea. It's entirely up to you. But you should really eat enough to set you up properly for the day!

A piece of interactive micro-fiction.

Move through the game by tapping on one of the options presented.

Game & programming: G_G

Breakfast plate art created by OgreofWart https://openclipart.org/detail/220175/full-english...

Mysterious Man art created by Buch http://opengameart.org/content/mysterious-man (released under CC by 3.0 license)
